name: beamUp (Knight-fall)
description:
made in 2:30hours for Trijam#210

Your goal is to get to the end of the autoscrolling level, and to get your laser fuel. If you touch the spikes or get too far behind, you die. 

Controls:

the laser shoots towards your mouse. Mouse only.

Theme Correlation:

You've literally got one shot. However, that is a pretty long shot.

I ran out of time, I could have made more levels. All sound from this game is from freesounds.org

thank you for playing!
